titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage State unemployment insurance laws to establish a system under which workers may purchase insurance to cover the costs of health insurance during periods of unemployment.

bill.summary: 3/14/1996--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit State unemployment insurance laws to establish a program under which individuals performing services covered under State law have the option of purchasing health insurance continuation benefits.
